partintro.para: Anyframe provides Monitoring Tool, which monitors the performance of Java EE-based applications, based on InfraRED, an open source. Monitoring Plugin is composed of the information on properties necessary to monitor sample applications created by installing the plugin under the assumption that Anyframe's Monitoring Tool has been installed and necessary reference libraries.
For more details on installation and execution of Monitoring Tool server, refer to Anyframe's Monitoring Tool manual.
Install monitoring plugin by entering the following command in the Command window.
The installation result can be checked by using the installed (mvn anyframe:installed) or the jetty:run (mvn clean jetty:run) commands.
